did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Editor, Helene Jordan, Correspondence

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: For a copy of the book published See:
FA880 Rockefeller University records, Special Events and Activities, 75th Anniversary Planning Committee.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: In 1976 The Rockefeller University celebrated its 75th year. Various events were scheduled and several days of conferences. The addresses were eventually published in a volume called "Beyond Tomorrow".&Helene Jordan, editor was the editor for the publication and this file is the correspondence concerning the manuscripts with the various speakers who included: Lord Ashly, Don K. Price, Rodney W. Nichols, Robert W. Berliner, Adolf Walter Jann, Ruth M. Davis, David Rockefeller, Sir Peter Medewar, Carlton B. Chapman, W.N. Hubbard, Jr., Aurelio Peccei, Richard E. Salomon, Donald W. Seldin, W.O. Baker.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

did.unittitle: Announcement to newspapers that Helene Jordan has been appointed as Director of the Rockefeller University Press
